content.xhtml:p: USE accautomation.ca/plc-programming-example-pick-and-place/ START BIT OF THE PROGRAM. THIS IS USED TO LATCH IN THE CONTACT IN ORDER TO START THE SEQUENCE OF EVENTS
INPUT CHANNEL SETUP. tHIS WILL SET UP THE INPUT CHANNEL WORD SO WE CAN USE TO COMPARE TO A PREDETERMINED WORD IN A SEQUENCE
STOP LIGHT IS CONTROLED BY THE STOP BUTTON. HOLDING THE STOP BUTTON FOR LONGER THAN 3 SECONDS WILL STOP THE COUNT BACK TO ZERO

OUTPUT CHANNEL SETUP: THIS WILL SET UP THE OUTPUT CHANNEL WORD SO WE CAN SEND IT TO THE ACTUAL OUTPUTS. NOTE THAT THE START BIT MUST BE ON FOR THE ENTRY AND EXIT CONVEYORS TO WORKS. THIS WAY WE CAN JOG THE PROCESS WITHOUT THE ITEMS ON THE CONVEYORS MOVING

SEQUNECE LOGIC: WHEN THE INPUT CHANNEL MATCHES THE WORD POINTED TO BY THE INPUT POINTER THE CORRESPONDING OUTPUT POINTER WILL MOVE THE OUTPUT WORD TO THE OUTPUT CHANNEL. THE INPUT AND OUTPUT POINTERS WILL THEN BE INCREMENTED BY ONE. THIS IS THE JOG SEQUENCE FUCTNION OF THE PROGRAM
